overview:
President at VoxoCall | Telephone Answering Services

Who We Are? VoxoCall has developed in to an advanced-technology enterprise, established to really make a difference in how telephone calls are handled and to keep communication lines open for business’ customers. VoxoCall is a nationwide answering service that was built on over 25,000 hours of best practices. At VoxoCall, we are proud of our team of professional and experienced agents who are ready to answer your calls. So let us handle the calls, and you can do what you do best!

What We Do When making phone calls, people prefer to talk to a live person. VoxoCall answers your customer’s calls for you live, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, without missing an important call. Getting your messages is easy; VoxoCall will dispatch your calls to you by phone, mobile device, email or fax them directly to you. Never miss that important call again!

Money in Your Pocket Keeping staffing expenses low is typically at the forefront of a business owner’s mind. On average VoxoCall will save you 25 times the cost if you were to hire additional in-house staff to answer your calls. With VoxoCall as your preferred provider it just makes economical sense.

Who We Serve? Here is a partial list of the type of companies we answer for:

Landscape Companies
Medical Supply & Services
Non-Profit Organizations
Nursing Homes & Care Centers
Property Management
Real Estate Professionals
Service Contractors
Veterinary Businesses
Attorneys
Carpet Cleaning
Churches
Consultants
Entrepreneurs
Funeral Services
Healthcare Professionals
Hospice Services
Internet & E-commerce

Mission Make a difference in the way we handle your calls.

Vision Be a great place to work. Be valuable. Be excellent.

Values Gratitude: be thankful for what we have. Leadership: the courage to shape a better future. Quality: do it well. Teamwork: together we can. Care: committed in heart and mind. Integrity: be real.
